meanings.definition: To watch over and direct (an activity or group of people)
meanings.sent1: She was overseeing the children playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: The manager is overseeing the construction of the new building.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be overseeing the birds chirping outside.
meanings.sent4: The teacher was like a hawk overseeing her students during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The security guard was overseeing the entrance, making sure only authorized personnel entered.

meanings.definition: To supervise or manage (a project or organization)
meanings.sent1: He is overseeing the development of the new software.
meanings.sent2: The CEO is overseeing the company's expansion into new markets.
meanings.sent3: The robot overseeing the factory made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The captain overseeing the ship navigated through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The chef overseeing the kitchen ensured that all dishes were prepared perfectly.
